feed.title: A wafer thin bite of computation
feed.subtitle: An academic blog with a mix of mathematics and software engineering.

entry.title: From molecular to continuum modelling of bistable liquid crystal devices

link.title: From molecular to continuum modelling of bistable liquid crystal devices

entry.content: Our paper to the Liquid Crystals journal was recently accepted. Big thank you to the RCUK block grant to make it open-access, so it is free to download for anyone.
entry.summary: Our paper to the Liquid Crystals journal was recently accepted. Big thank you to the RCUK block grant to make it open-access, so it is free to download for anyone.
